recipesJson.name: Haven (Cookie Dough, Custard, Creme Brulee)
recipesJson.author: oddDrop
recipesJson.description:
"And when the world is caving. Baby, you're my safe haven, you're my safe haven."
HAVEN: STARRING: COOKIE DOUGH, CUSTARD, & CREME BRULEE
(Wayne took one look at this and said to remove half of the recipe, 3 people disagree and think its great the way it is)
Directed by: oddDrop
Notes:
So in this version I wanted to make my own custard that didn't use the common concentrates we use to make them.
FLV COOKIE DOUGH/FA COOKIE: They absolutely knocked this flavor out of the park. You even get little bits of chocolate chips. What more is there to say. It just works. While its good it lacks texture so I added FA cookie to help boost the grain perception.

INW SHISHA VANILLA/TPA BAVARIAN CREAM/FA MERINGUE. I wanted a custard leaning more towards the white and ice cream side rather than heavy on the egg yolks, I used meringue for egg whites and the rest for sugar and creams. 

INW CREME BRULEE/FA CREAM FRESH/FLV CREAM: Again this combo just goes to show good juice and flavorings don't have to always be a challenge, they just have to be the right ones. Inw creme brulee is what it says. While the creams are there to help balance and add emulsion to the cream.

reviews.text: So rich and smooth. This is a banger for me, thank you m!
very good . i like how you built your own custard type base

I've been unable to get away from Obsidian.  It's one of those "I don't know what it tastes like....  But it's goooood" type vapes.  I mixed this today and off the shake it's really really delicious.. It's the only other recipe i've used FLV Cookie Dough in and its clear to me now that FLV Cookie Dough is a top notch flavor.  It's only been a few hours since I mixed this but I'm gonna second @yeahIvape and say it's my top cookie dough recipe now.
Amazing after a 5 day steep thank you! Rich creamy, and doughie, favorite cookie dough recipe to date
Vaped after 5 days steep. Wonderfully smooth yet rich vape. Deft hands at work here.  Probably my favourite Cookie Dough recipe so far.
This stuff is fabulous, I've only let it sit 2 days so I can only imagine how good it will be after a long curing period. Well done and thanks for sharing.
